extendedInfo.description: Drivers Ed Alabama is brought to you free of charge by DriversEd.com!! _________________________________________ Need a license in Alabama? Study anytime, any place with Drivers Ed Alabama for any Android device.FREE from DriversEd.com, the leader in online drivers education, this full-featured study companion can quiz you from a database of more than 350 MVD questions. Your results are recorded so you can track your progress and review your incorrect answers. Retake past tests as many times as you want to make sure you know the material. Pick the length of each testâtake a test of 5 questions or as many as 100. Itâs your choice! Use the Flash Card feature to quickly study the important facts you need to know for the test.Of course, youâll still need to read the Alabama Driver's Manual to prepare for the permit test. With Drivers Ed Alabama, you can download the AL Driver's Manual to your device anytime! After the first download, the manual is saved on your device so you donât have to wait for the download again. The AL manual is an official MVD publication in PDF format. The text is crystal clear (pinch to zoom, just like a web page). This app works with DriversEd.comâs Alabama drivers education course, which you can take to get your drivers license! DriversEd.com is approved by Road Safety Educators' Association & The Driving School Association of the Americas. Features: + Over 350 questions + Each Quiz pulls random questions, giving you a different quiz each time + Select the number of questions you want in each quiz + Results for each quiz are saved for your review and study. Tests can be retaken. + Download Alabamaâs Drivers Manual so you can read and study any time + Study with flash cards

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Love app! Easy to navigate. Got this app for my kids to practice and have even enjoyed using it myself.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great over all
reviews.comment: This app features great practice tools. My only wish is that it would display answered questions after the practice test in a clearer fashion
reviews.author: Dima Antselevich

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I\'ll definetly past the test now!:D
reviews.author: Alan Segura

reviews.comment: I studied this and failed my permit test , yes its a good app but it wasn\'t helpful to me in my situation.
reviews.author: shakira vance
